text:
If you edit the config.layout file and make an additional ENTRY then select
--enable-layout=Entry it runs the the ./configure then says can not find "ENTRY".

The issue is that the file config.layout exists in 3 locations. Each file is
slightly different and the files are not links.

My understanding of the documentation is that you edit the
./httpd-2.0.45/config.layout and add an entry then run the configure. To get
this to work even with "classic or Apache" requires edits to:

./srclib/apr/config.layout and
./srclib/apr-util/config.layout

These files should be symbolic links to the main file or the parameters should
be command line configure options.
creator: colin@bitterfield.com
chip@force-elite.com
text:
apr and apr-util are separate projects, and we will not be creating symlinks for
the config.layout files.
